title: How to Make Candy Cane Pie

steps.headline: Melt the marshmallows and milk in a large saucepan on low heat.
steps.description: Stir with a wooden spoon until the mixture fully melts.

steps.headline: Remove the marshmallow mixture from heat.
Mix the salt, vanilla, extract, and food coloring into the marshmallow mixture.
steps.description: Stir well with a wooden spoon.

steps.headline: Allow the mixture to cool for about half an hour, stirring occasionally every couple minutes.
Fold in only two tablespoons of the candy and mix in the whipped cream.
Pour the candy cane filling onto the pie crust.
Cover the pie and allow it to chill for about 8 hours till overnight.
Serve.
steps.description: Garnish the pie with the remaining crushed candy. Slice a piece of pie and place it on a serving plate. Enjoy!

text: Melt the marshmallows and milk in a large saucepan on low heat. Stir with a wooden spoon until the mixture fully melts. Remove the marshmallow mixture from heat.  Mix the salt, vanilla, extract, and food coloring into the marshmallow mixture. Stir well with a wooden spoon. Allow the mixture to cool for about half an hour, stirring occasionally every couple minutes.  Fold in only two tablespoons of the candy and mix in the whipped cream.  Pour the candy cane filling onto the pie crust.  Cover the pie and allow it to chill for about 8 hours till overnight.  Serve. Garnish the pie with the remaining crushed candy. Slice a piece of pie and place it on a serving plate. Enjoy!
